eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Chelan, WA; AT 02:51 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:51 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 3 Evacuation Order in Blewett Pass. The affected area is Summit of Old Blewett Pass. Leave now.  Roads and evacuation routes can get blocked. If you don't leave now, you may be trapped, injured, or killed. CHECK Local media or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Facebook. 
Repeat.
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 3 Evacuation Order in Blewett Pass. The affected area is Summit of Old Blewett Pass. Leave now. Roads and  evacuation routes can get blocked. If you don't leave now, you may be trapped, injured, or killed. CHECK Local media or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Face book. You will be kept advised as conditions change.  Please monitor local radio stations and Chelan County Emergency Management Facebook for updates.
